title: Shattered Relics League/Unlocks

properties.name: description
properties.value: Not all content is immediately accessible in Shattered Relics League. Content may be unlocked using Sage's Renown.

content:
Shattered Relics League
Guide

Not all content is immediately accessible in Shattered Relics League. Content may be unlocked using Sage's Renown.

Contents

  • 1 Sage's Renown
  • 2 Skills
  • 3 Bosses
  • 4 Quests
    • 4.1 List of quest costs
    • 4.2 Storyline breakdown
    • 4.3 Details

Sage's Renown[edit | edit source]

Sage's Renown is a new type of currency created for Shattered Relics League that is gained by completing league tasks. It can be used to unlock skills and bosses during the league. Renown can also be spent to auto-complete specific quests.

Completing all the league tasks will grant a total of 3,463 points. A total of 1,352 points are required if it is used to unlock all quests, skills, and bosses.

Skills[edit | edit source]

A player unlocks a skill.

Locked skills can be trained, but no experience will be granted. For example, players can chop a log without woodcutting unlocked due to it being a level 1 action. Locked skills can also be boosted to beyond level 1.

The total Unlock Cost for all skills is 190 Sage's Renown.

Skill Unlock Cost
Attack 10
Agility 5
Construction 15
Cooking 10
Crafting 15
Defence 0
Farming 10
Firemaking 5
Fishing 0
Fletching 10
Herblore[s 1] 15
Hitpoints 5
Hunter 5
Magic 10
Mining 5
Prayer 15
Ranged 10
Runecraft 5
Slayer 15
Smithing 10
Strength 10
Thieving 0
Woodcutting 5
  1. ↑ Unlocking Herblore also auto-completes Druidic Ritual (if it hadn't been completed already) and sets experience in the skill to 174.

Bosses[edit | edit source]

A player unlocks a boss.

With the exception of the Wilderness, most bosses are locked.

The total cost of all Boss Unlocks is 600 Sage's Renown.

Boss Unlock Cost
Bryophyta 5
Grotesque Guardians 10
Giant Mole 10
Obor 5
Tempoross 10
Wintertodt 10
Barrows Brothers 15
Dagannoth Kings 15
Sarachnis 10
Kalphite Queen 10
Hespori 5
Skotizo 5
Zalcano 15
King Black Dragon 10
Kraken 20
Abyssal Sire 20
Thermonuclear smoke devil 20
The Gauntlet 30
Zulrah 30
Cerberus 20
Vorkath 30
General Graardor 30
K'ril Tsutsaroth 30
Commander Zilyana 30
Kree'arra 30
The Nightmare 30
Corporeal Beast 30
Chambers of Xeric 35
Alchemical Hydra 30
Theatre of Blood 35
Nex[q 1] 15
The Mimic Free
  1. ↑ Requires all God Wars Bosses to be unlocked.

Quests[edit | edit source]

A player unlocks a quest group.

Quests are completable as normal, as long as the skill level requirements are met. Using Sage's Renown, players have the option to auto-complete quests to unlock content more quickly. Renown costs vary based on the difficulty of the quest. The total cost of a quest will include the cost of its pre-requisites if they are also incomplete. However, unlocking a quest will also unlock all its pre-requisites. If there is a league task to complete a quest, purchasing an auto-completion will count for the task. Auto-completing quests will not grant the experience.

List of quest costs[edit | edit source]

Difficulty Renown cost
Novice 2
Intermediate 3
Experienced 4
Master 7
Grandmaster 15
Special 2
Kourend house favour 4

Storyline breakdown[edit | edit source]

This table illustrates the renown cost from point A to point B with autounlocking everything.

Buying every unlock totals 562 Sage's Renown. Each unlock adds up to 985, however due to duplication of quest and task completion it is less.

rawContent:
{{Shattered Relics League Guide Nav}}

Not all content is immediately accessible in [[Shattered Relics League]]. Content may be unlocked using Sage's Renown.

==Sage's Renown==
Sage's Renown is a new type of currency created for Shattered Relics League that is gained by completing league tasks. It can be used to unlock [[skills]] and [[bosses]] during the league. Renown can also be spent to auto-complete specific [[quests]].

Completing all the league tasks will grant a total of 3,463 points. A total of 1,352 points are required if it is used to unlock all quests, skills, and bosses.

==Skills==
[[File:Shattered unlock - Skill.gif|thumb|180px|A player unlocks a skill.]]
Locked skills can be trained, but no experience will be granted. For example, players can chop a log without woodcutting unlocked due to it being a level 1 action. Locked skills can also be boosted to beyond level 1.

The total Unlock Cost for all skills is '''190 Sage's Renown.'''

==Quests==
[[File:Shattered unlock - Quest.gif|thumb|180px|A player unlocks a quest group.]]
Quests are completable as normal, as long as the skill level requirements are met. Using Sage's Renown, players have the option to auto-complete quests to unlock content more quickly. Renown costs vary based on the difficulty of the quest. The total cost of a quest will include the cost of its pre-requisites if they are also incomplete. However, unlocking a quest will also unlock all its pre-requisites. If there is a league task to complete a quest, purchasing an auto-completion will count for the task. Auto-completing quests will '''not''' grant the experience.

===List of quest costs===
{|class="wikitable align-center-2"
! Difficulty!! Renown cost
|-
|Novice||2
|-
|Intermediate||3
|-
|Experienced||4
|-
|Master||7
|-
|Grandmaster||15
|-
|Special||2
|-
|Kourend house favour||4
|}

===Storyline breakdown===
This table illustrates the renown cost from point A to point B with autounlocking everything.

Buying every unlock totals '''562 Sage's Renown'''. Each unlock adds up to 985, however due to duplication of quest and task completion it is less.

{| class="wikitable sortable lighttable"
! Unlock Name !! Initial Cost !! Main Quest !! Additional Quests !! Additional Content Access
|-
